name: Mischievous Thigh Invitation
outcome: {AttackerName} deftly takes {TargetName}'s hands and drags them to {AttackerHisOrHer} supple thighs, ensuring {TargetName}'s hands are completely enveloped.

statusOutcome: The soft feel of {AttackerName}'s thighs lingers in {TargetName}'s head. {TargetName} is charmed!
